nodes.text: Pinyumb Transport Station Four was a location in the planet Sullust's capital city Pinyumb. The transport station had a cargo lift starting at the upper levels which transported individuals from the cavern where Pinyumb was situated to the surface of the planet. In 3 ABY, the stormtrooper Thara Nyende was stationed in the security office of the Pinyumb Transport Station Four, removing her helmet while on duty. She was soon called to the upper levels after the CR90 corvette Thunderstrike arrived at Sullust to retrieve the Rebel Alliance's 61st Mobile Infantry, and took the cargo lift to the surface to see the corvette get shot down.
Pinyumb Transport Station Four appeared in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
